overview:
Dr. Hanno Fichtner is Managing Director and Co-Founder at HitFox Game Ventures.

Before starting at HitFox, Hanno worked at management consulting firm McKinsey. For seven years he mainly helped clients on strategic and sales & marketing topics and setting up their online business models.

Prior to McKinsey, Hanno was Founder and CEO of the VC-backed mobile marketing firm SMS-Rabatt. Furthermore, he founded squeaker.net, an online career network for high-potential talents.

Hanno studied Business at the University of Cologne and received a PhD for his dissertation on company culture in strategic management from the University of Bremen.
